name: Frenemy (SilentYetiGames)
description:
Have you ever tried playing a game while your annoying brother throws balls at you? 

Welcome to Frenemy, Play as Orvo as he traverses his 2d world in search of friendship or foe ship in this short platformer! Discover how to traverse over hidden dangers and make it to the end of each level while your knuckleheaded friend Throst tries to kill you ... or help you, it all depends on his mood. Discover how much annoyance you can take before you become a Frenemy! 

There are 3 cheat codes available in this small game can you figure them out?

Made for "Monthly Game Jam"
